EmailTemplate.name: 2023 - Offices (Government) iContact
EmailTemplate.subject: Modular office building for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi! Are you thinking you might need to lease or purchase a modular office building in the near future?
BOXX Modular is here to help you proactively plan so you don't have to worry about not having space when you need it most.
> MOBILE OFFICES: https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/mobile/ > OFFICE COMPLEXES: https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/complexes/ > CUSTOM OFFICE CONSTRUCTION: https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/custom/
Get more information... ﻿ ﻿> Request A Quote on our website: https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request/ ﻿ ﻿> Reply to this email ﻿ ﻿> Call your local expert directly at 877-966-7839
Get your office ready for operation with our Building Add-ons, including furniture, steps, awnings, and more. https://www.boxxmodular.com/add-ons/
Our desire is to help you be successful in supporting your community. We are here to help!
